Items.name: dagger
Items.description: Throw daggers at surrounding enemies damaging the first enemy hit with the dagger
Items.lv5Effect:
Damage +25%
Number of daggers +2
Cooldown -1s
Daggers can pierce through multiple enemies

Items.name: field
Items.description: Spawns a field around the player. Enemies inside the field will take damage every second

Items.name: arrow
Items.description: Fires an arrow in the target direction dealing damage to any enemies it passes through

Items.name: fireball
Items.description: summon fireballs from the sky striking the enemies closest to the player

Items.name: hammer
Items.description: Swing a hammer in the target direction damaging and knocking back enemies hit
